Table.tableName: Worst toxicity per patient (all cycles) by irinotecan dose level considered related to irinotecan in combination with continuous infusion 5-FU
Table.tableFooter: NCI-CTC=National Cancer Institute-Common Toxicity Criteria; ALP=alkaline phosphatase; HFS=hand-foot syndrome.aRelated to 5-FU infusion.bSix patients had grade 1 HFS.c11 patients had grade 1 nausea.

Document.DocumentTitle: Phase I dose-escalation trial of irinotecan with continuous infusion 5-FU first line, in metastatic colorectal cancer
